data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: When it comes to a time when I was eager to do something, the first thing that springs to my mind is to ski on a snowy mountain. It was last winter after I saw a video that my friend Will shot while skiing, which left me a great impression, the desire for skiing had been implanted in my mind. It never occurred to me that skiing could be so much fun. And I was surprised to find that the scenery on a snowy mountain could be so gorgeous. His description changed my point of view on skiing, so I can expand my horizon. I had never been so eager to go skiing. (113字)
data.referenceText: Talk about a time you were eager to do something or meet someone.
data.referenceTranslate: 谈论你渴望做某事或遇见某人的一次。
